name: unpackr
title: Unpackr
description: Intelligently merges and organizes ZIP files with automatic deduplication. Works with Google Takeout or any ZIP files.
author: shak

commands.name: index
commands.title: Merge Google Takeout Files
commands.description: Unzip and merge multiple Google Takeout ZIPs into one folder

preferences.name: defaultInputDir
preferences.title: Default Input Folder
preferences.description: The folder where you typically download your ZIP files (e.g., ~/Downloads).

preferences.name: defaultOutputDir
preferences.title: Default Output Folder
preferences.description: The folder where your merged files should go (e.g., ~/Downloads or ~/Pictures).
